attributes.action: give support for the return of Prince Charles' moustache
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite their changing role in today's society, the Monarchy still stand as an institution of great and vital importance to this nation. In anticipation of Prince Charles's reign as King, and in an effort to support him in this position, we urge him to regrow the moustache once sported in 1974.  
So that Charles may be at ease to gather support for the principles for which he stands, it is only right that this facial feature be returned and with it the authority and kingship that it brings. 
We plead with the Prime Minister to support us in this, in the interests of good government and the secure future of our nation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
